p: In our primary IAV immunization protocols, infectious allantoic fluid containing indicated viruses was diluted in sterile PBS before ~600 hemagglutinating units were injected i.p. into each mouse. In several experiments, PR8 was incubated in a 55°C water bath for 30 minutes [ 44]. TCID 50 assays confirmed the loss of infectivity by heat-inactivated PR8, which was then injected intramuscularly (i.m.), 50 μL into each thigh muscle, using a 25-gauge needle.
